Hydra username enumeration on 172.10.0.3 SSH port 22022 with the password 'invalidpass' did not return any valid usernames.

Since it's possible that password authentication is enabled but no usernames from the common list match, next I will try a default credential brute-force attempt on SSH with a combined username and password list.

I will use usernames from /usr/share/seclists/Usernames/top-usernames-shortlist.txt and passwords from /usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt (first 1000 lines to avoid long runtime).

Starting with that attempt on SSH service port 22022 on target 172.10.0.3.
